name: Floor is lava (itch) (XinranCheng)
description: Floor is lavaThe majority of individuals likely had the childhood fantasy that they could only move about the home with the aid of different pieces of furniture, with the most crucial restriction being that neither foot should ever contact the floor, which was composed of fictitious lava. A black cat serves as the game's protagonist, and it navigates the environment with the aid of various stars. The cat must leap without touching any obstacles or the ground, otherwise the "lava" will burn the cat to dea
